sentences.english: To that big rock candy mountain?
Pour in vodak, soya sauces and rock sugar.
sentences.chinese: 淋入加饭酒，酱油及冰糖。

sentences.english: Heat up a wok with salad oil. Add in sugar and salt until fragrant and sugar has melted.
sentences.chinese: 油烧热，放入砂糖炒出香味至冰糖融化。

sentences.english: According to Josh, it's like "eating horrendously sharp rock candy".
sentences.chinese: 据乔什描述，就像”在吃一块吓人又锋利的冰糖“。

sentences.english: The old man was wandering on the streets selling sugarcoated haws on sticks.
sentences.chinese: 卖冰糖葫芦的老爷爷走街串巷地叫卖。

sentences.english: He ground the rock candy with a mortar and pestle .
sentences.chinese: 他自己动手用研钵和杵把冰糖研成粉。

sentences.english: Season soup with rock sugar to mark it a sweet drink.
sentences.chinese: 可加入少许冰糖调味作甜汤饮用。

sentences.english: Many in the Diet have seen crystal sugar.
sentences.chinese: 在很多药膳中都冰糖的身影。

sentences.english: Hence, ice-sugar became my youth favorite, and only snacks.
sentences.chinese: 于是，冰糖成了我幼时最爱吃的，也是唯一的零食。

sentences.english: I plan to buy some herb Chuan Bei tomorrow to put together with sugar.
sentences.chinese: 明天我打算买点川贝，自制冰糖川贝炖雪梨。

sentences.english: Flameout stay rock candy melt completely, the tremella soup to cool.
sentences.chinese: 待冰糖完全融化后熄火，使银耳汤冷却。

sentences.english: Citric acid and lacto-calcium can reduce the pungency of acetic acid beverage, rock candy as the sweeter…
